name: Balloon Dog
description:
You play as a balloon dog trying to survive a war revenged countryside. 

Use arrow keys to move and space to dash. Blue darts do one damage. Red darts also do one damage but move faster. Green darts move slow but do 2 damage. 

Potential future changes if I can be bothered:

  • Update background textures.
  • Make actual menu background.
  • Improve/add popping animation to the balloon dog and health counter.
  • Add a third 'P' to the 'POPED' sprite.
  • Improve particle effect.
  • Improve dialoged to make storyline more apparent.
  • Add high scores and leaderboards.
  • Add Story mode.
  • Improve enemy AI.
  • Add Multiplayer.
  • Add Unlockable characters.
  • Get balloon dog into Smash.
  • Add French maid costume.
  • Improve motion controls.
  • Add dance pad compatibility.
  • Add loot crates.
  • Improve drop rate of Miko Mitama.
  • Add multi level marketing.
  • Add dating side quest. 
  • Updated localization files.
